original: intros f a b pr. unfold Riemann_integrable in *. intros eps. destruct (pr eps) as [phi [psi [H1 H2]]]. exists (fun x => - phi x). exists psi. split. - intros t Ht. unfold Rabs. rewrite Ropp_minus_distr. replace (- f t - - phi t) with (phi t - f t) by lra. apply H1. apply Ht. - rewrite Rabs_Ropp. apply H2.
